Name: Sputnik #2
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Orange, cognac and rum meld well. Fruity and refreshing.
History: A cocktail served in underground clubs all over the former Eastern Bloc. It was originally made with cheap Cuban rum, Georgian brandy and tinned orange juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Sputnik #2 contains 208 calories
